# taxminer

<!-- badges: start -->

<!-- badges: end -->

Taxonomic annotations - BLAST alignment and text-mining based filtration in R

\*In March 2022, annotation scores and GNU parallel were introduced in the normal workflow.

## Installation

The latest version of taxminer can be installed as follows:

``` r
devtools::install_github("SchahzadSaqib/taxminer")
```

## References

-   rentrez - Winter DJ (2017). “rentrez: an R package for the NCBI eUtils API.” The R Journal, 9, 520–526.

-   dada2 - Callahan BJ, McMurdie PJ, Rosen MJ, Han AW, Johnson AJA, Holmes SP (2016). “DADA2: High-resolution sample inference from Illumina amplicon data.” Nature Methods, 13, 581-583. doi: 10.1038/nmeth.3869.

-   GNU parallel - Tange, O. (2022, February 22). GNU Parallel 20220222 ('Donetsk Luhansk'). Zenodo. <https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.6213471>
